articles.title: Taiwan sees limited impact from Ukraine war on chip supply chain - CNA
articles.description:
TAIPEI: Taiwan expects little impact from the war in Ukraine on the supply of key raw materials for semiconductors, the government said on Saturday (Feb 26).
